definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[אדן]] (mng. disputed; (1) cf. As. [adannu] firm, strong; adv. adannisû, strongly, exceedingly Dl:W > (2) Fü. (a) make firm, fasten (cf. 9dn) whence [[אֶדֶן]]; (b) determine, command, rule, whence [[אָדוֹן]]; (3) Thes Add., MV al. (a) intr.be under, low, inferior (cf. [[דּוּן]], d0n), whence [[אֶדֶן]]; (b) tr. put under command, rule over (cf. [[דִּין]]) whence [[אָדוֹן]]; v. also (4) Lag:M. i. 102, [[אָדוֹן]] fr. 0dy).
